means: 无法防御的，站不住脚的

sentence.Network_en: To argue otherwise is trying to defend the indefensible.
sentence.Network_cn: 持相反的论点就是试图为站不住脚的事情强辩。

sentence.Network_en: She described the new policy as "morally indefensible".
sentence.Network_cn: 她认为新政策“在道德上是站不住脚的”。

sentence.Network_en: The checkpoint was abandoned as militarily indefensible.
sentence.Network_cn: 检查站因为军事上无法防御而被舍弃。

entry.tran: 站不住脚的;无可辩解的
entry.def: If you say that a statement, action, or idea is indefensible, you mean that it cannot be justified or supported because it is completely wrong or unacceptable.

example.tran: 他的行为是不可原谅的。

example.ex: She described the new policy as 'morally indefensible'.
example.tran: 她认为新政策“在道德上是站不住脚的”。

entry.tran: 无法防御的;无法保卫的
entry.def: Places or buildings that are indefensible cannot be defended if they are attacked.

example.ex: The checkpoint was abandoned as militarily indefensible.
example.tran: 检查站因为军事上无法防御而被舍弃。

means.word_mean: 1. (of theories etc) incapable of being defended or justified
2. incapable of being justified or explained

auth_sentence.content: That is not only nuts but it is morally indefensible.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is not only nuts but it is morally indefensible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is not only nuts but it is morally indefensible.

auth_sentence.content: To do that would be both morally and practically indefensible.
auth_sentence.res_content: To do that would be both morally and practically indefensible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To do that would be both morally and practically indefensible.

auth_sentence.content: But paying the fuel subsidy to high-rate taxpayers is indefensible.
auth_sentence.res_content: But paying the fuel subsidy to high-rate taxpayers is indefensible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But paying the fuel subsidy to high-rate taxpayers is indefensible.

means.word_mean: 无法防御的,站不住脚的   ; 不可原谅的

sentences.cn: 我觉得这样的行为是不可原谅的。

sentences.en: Her silly behaviour puts her in an indefensible position.
sentences.cn: 她行为无聊,叫人无法原谅她。
